name: Rainbow Palette Postal Service NPC Generator
name_original: Rainbow Palette Postal Service NPC Generator
description:
The Rainbow Palette Postal Service is an RPG campaign I ran recently wherein the PC's were fantasy mailmen.  This NPC generation program creates unicorn folk, cat folk, humans and bird folk with some basic alignments, builds and special accessories.

The program is entirely text-based, so keep that in mind, but you absolutely can copy and paste 10 characters at a time from the generator.
